GTA V.cpu: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Processor (4 CPUs) @ 2.5GHz
GTA V.os: Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1

Valorant.cpu: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 / AMD Athlon 200GE

Counter-Strike 2.cpu: 4 hardware CPU cores - Intel® Core™ i5 750 or higher
Counter-Strike 2.gpu: Video card must be 1 GB or more and should be DirectX 11 compatible with support for Shader Model 5.0

Minecraft.cpu: Intel Core i3-3210 3.2 GHz / AMD A8-7600 APU 3.1 GHz or equivalent
Minecraft.gpu: Intel HD Graphics 4000 (Ivy Bridge) or AMD Radeon R5 series (Kaveri line) with OpenGL 4.4
